1.label: Basic Set Dim Level (Off)
1.description: When the flood trigger is off, send this dim level via the Basic CC to Group 2.

2.label: Basic Set Dim Level (On)
2.description: When the flood trigger is on, send this dim level via the Basic CC to Group 2.

5[0x01].label: Flood Sensor Function
5[0x01].description: Enable or disable the flood function.

5[0x08].label: Temperature Scale
5[0x08].description: Configure the temperature scale reported by the device.

5[0x20].label: Temperature Report When Triggered
5[0x20].description: Determines whether a temperature report is sent after an event is triggered.

6.label: Humidity Report When Triggered
6.description: Determines whether a temperature report is sent after an event is triggered.

7[0x08].label: Disable Basic Off after flood
7[0x08].description: Determines whether a Basic Off event is sent after a flood event is cleared.

7[0x10].label: Notification Type
7[0x10].description: Determines the type of report sent.

7[0x20].label: Send Multi CC Reports
7[0x20].description: Determines whether a Multi CC report is sent when sending the automatic report.

7[0x40].label: Report Battery State When Triggered
7[0x40].description: Determines whether the battery state is reported when the device is triggered.

10.label: Auto Report Battery Time
10.description: The time interval upon which to report the battery level.

13.label: Auto Report Temperature Time
13.description: The time interval upon which to report the temperature.

14.label: Auto Report Humidity Time
14.description: The time interval upon which to report the humidity.

15.label: Auto Report Flood Time
15.description: The time interval upon which to report the flood state.

20.label: Auto Report Time Unit
20.description: Determines the time unit used by parameters 10 & 13-15 (time interval * time unit).

21.label: Temperature Differential Report
21.description: Determines the temperature differential that will trigger a report.

23.label: Humidity Differential Report
23.description: Determines the humidity differential that will trigger a report.
